channel.title: 508 server help
channel.description:
Hi!I downloaded the titania,i downloaded 508 client,server.But,if i run the run.cmd,i get that error:[img]http://kepfeltoltes.hu/081231/system_www.kepfeltoltes.hu_.jpg[/img]
Please help me,i dont know what to do!

item.title: 508 server help
item.dc:creator: @strbence strbence
item.description:
@strbence wrote:

yes,i do this.I edited my all.bat. But,i wait 1 min,the all.bat says press a button,i press,it exit,i try to start run.cmd,but it says that error.
please help my i am verry angry because only my computer are bad,i maked everything good,installed titanica,put the cache508 in C: but not work!
plz help

Read full topic

item.title: 508 server help
item.dc:creator: @r34p4g3pk r34p4g3pk
item.description:
@r34p4g3pk wrote:

Mod Cody, you don’t need to run the “All,” batch file, you don’t have the rigth paths set, here are the right ones:

CLASSPATH - CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin;%CLASSPATH%; You can change the jdk1.6.0_07 to your java version such as jdk 11.

PATH - C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin; Do the same with this also.

I sugegst getting a newer version then 6.6, There that should fix your error.
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 31, 2008, 09:19:23 pm[/size][hr]Unless your running the wrong run.bat.

Read full topic
